dcterms:creator: Richard Socher
Alex Perelygin
Jean Y Wu
Jason Chuang
Christopher D Manning
Andrew Y Ng
Christopher Potts
dcterms:description: The Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST) consists of 11855 movie reviews, fully annotated with sentiment labels. It is used for sentiment classification tasks, including fine-grained classification with 5 labels and binary classification.
dcterms:title: Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST)

dcterms:creator: Xin Li
Dan Roth
dcterms:description: The TREC dataset is used for question classification, categorizing questions into specific types such as location, human, entity, abbreviation, description, and numeric. It contains labeled questions for training and testing.
dcterms:title: TREC
